com.flowpowered.react.engine

Class DynamicsWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.engine.CollisionWorld
      • com.flowpowered.react.engine.DynamicsWorld
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkedDynamicsWorld

    public class DynamicsWorld
extends CollisionWorld
    This class represents a dynamics world. This class inherits from the CollisionWorld class. In a dynamics world bodies can collide and their movements are simulated using the laws of physics.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.flowpowered.react.engine.CollisionWorld

        mBodies, mCollisionDetection, mCollisionShapes, mCurrentBodyID, mFreeBodiesIDs, mOverlappingPairs

      Constructs a new dynamics world from the gravity and the time step.

        public void setSolveFrictionAtContactManifoldCenterActive(boolean isActive)
        Activates or deactivates the solving of friction constraints at the center of the contact manifold instead of solving them at each contact point.
        Parameters:
        isActive - Whether or not to solve the friction constraint at the center of the manifold

        Returns:

      • setSleepLinearVelocity

        public void setSleepLinearVelocity(float sleepLinearVelocity)
        Sets the sleep linear velocity. When the velocity of a body becomes smaller than the sleep linear/angular velocity for a given amount of time, the body starts sleeping and does not need to be simulated anymore.
        Parameters:
        sleepLinearVelocity - The sleep linear velocity

      • getSleepAngularVelocity

        public float getSleepAngularVelocity()
        Returns the current sleep angular velocity.
        Returns:
        The sleep angular velocity

      • setSleepAngularVelocity

        Sets the sleep angular velocity. When the velocity of a body becomes smaller than the sleep linear/angular velocity for a given amount of time, the body starts sleeping and does not need to be simulated anymore.
        Parameters:
        sleepAngularVelocity - The sleep angular velocity

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the physics simulation. The elapsed time is determined by the timer. A step is only actually taken if enough time has passed. If a lot of time has passed, more than twice the time step, multiple steps will be taken, to catch up.

        protected void tick()

      • createRigidBody

        public RigidBody createRigidBody(Transform transform,
                                 float mass,
                                 CollisionShape collisionShape)
        Creates a mobile rigid body and adds it to the physics world. The inertia tensor will be computed from the shape and mass.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform (position and orientation) of the body
        mass - The mass of the body
        collisionShape - The collision shape
        Returns:
        The new rigid body

      • createRigidBody

                                 float mass,
                                 Matrix3x3 inertiaTensorLocal,
                                 CollisionShape collisionShape)
        Creates a mobile rigid body and adds it to the physics world.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform (position and orientation) of the body
        mass - The mass of the body
        inertiaTensorLocal - The local inertia tensor
        collisionShape - The collision shape
        Returns:
        The new rigid body

        Parameters:

      • addRigidBody

        public void addRigidBody(RigidBody body)
        Adds a rigid body to the body collections and the collision detection. If a tick is in progress, the body is added at the end.
        Parameters:
        body - The body to add
